message: I propose we divide the money 3:2 in my favor. This seems fair considering the risk of inflation.
I'm not convinced by your 3:2 ratio. I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds, given the risk of inflation and our previous disagreement.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not willing to give up the majority. I think I can get a better deal next round.
